TMC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Methodologist Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 13:03 IST
 Tata Memorial Centre
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 85,000 to 100,000




FOLLOW

The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Methodologist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD/ MS, and Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Maharashtra.

TMC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Methodologist 	02	MBBS, MD/ MS, Ph.D

Age Limit for the TMC Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years

Selection Process for the TMC Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the TMC Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 85,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 1,00,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the TMC Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025 
Visit the offcial website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Methodologist Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	19-08-2025
Last Date of Application	30-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
